message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 70/30 split in favor of you, Bob. This might seem a bit generous, but remember, the value of money decreases by 10% in each subsequent round.
I propose an 80/20 split in my favor.  While we both lose value each round, I believe this split is more fair as I am taking the risk of rejection and losing 20% of the potential value.
